title: Upgrading to Mongoid Beta 6
description:
If you are working with Rails 3 and Mongoid, you’re likely to upgrade to [mongoid-2.0.0.beta6][1]. That’s okay, but you will run into a few problems. Among others, one will be:
Database should be a Mongo::DB, not NilClass or
Mongoid::Errors::InvalidDatabase: Mongoid::Errors::InvalidDatabase Another, Mongoid-related problem is the error uninitialized constant OrderedHash.
Luckily, these problems can be solved quite easily. [1]: http://rubygems.org/gems/mongoid
The first thing you need to do is make sure you use the right version of bson_ext.
